import React from 'react'; import { Link, Element, Events, animateScroll as scroll, scrollSpy } from 'react-scroll'; import './Services.css'; import { amy, booking, request, relax, lisa, cheryl } from "./assets/images" const Services = () => { const scrollToNextSection = () => { scroll.scrollTo(700); // Adjust the value based on your content height }; return (

Special Requests and One-Time Services

In addition to our full services, we offer special requests and one-time services to meet your unique needs. This includes move-in and move-out cleanings, garbage and organization services, and add-on services like carpet cleanings, refrigerator, and inside the oven cleaning.

); }; export default Services;
